c74object.name: crow.volts
c74object.digest: Set CV output values on crow
c74object.description: Connect crow.volts to the crow Max object to control the CV outputs on the crow eurorack module.

method.name: float
method.description: Set crow.volts specified hardware output to a new voltage (the last slew time will be used).

method.name: list
method.description: The first number specifies a target value (in volts), and the second number specifies a total amount of time (in seconds); crow slews the selected output to the target voltage in the specified amount of time.

method.name: channel
method.digest: Set hardware output, target voltage, and slew time
method.description: The word channel, followed by an output index (1-4), a voltage (in volts, float, optional), and a slew time (in seconds, float) (optional), sets the selected output to the target voltage in the specified amount of time.

method.name: bang
method.digest: Slew the specified output to the target.
method.description: A bang sent to the left inlet will slew the specified output to the target in the current slew time.
